meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The fritillaria bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of fritillaria for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide nuts in the fritillaria flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rang out like a field of fritillaria in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the fritillaria danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The bulb of this plant, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist prepared a remedy using fritillaria bulbs.
meanings.sent2: She brewed a tea with fritillaria to soothe her sore throat.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted around a fritillaria bulb like a toy.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as soothing as a potion made from fritillaria bulbs.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fritillaria filled the room, calming everyone.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the lily family.
meanings.sent1: The fritillaria genus includes many unique species.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the characteristics of fritillaria plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit nibbled on a fritillaria leaf and hopped away.
meanings.sent4: The diversity of fritillaria plants is like a colorful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: In the field, the fritillaria genus painted a vibrant picture.
